sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-slide-group
      style="width: 800px !important;height: 280px !important; overflow-x: auto !important;"
      class="pa-4"
      show-arrows
  >
    <v-slide-item
        v-for="n in 15"
        :key="n"
        v-slot="{ active, toggle }"
    >
      <v-card
          :color="active ? 'primary' : 'grey lighten-1'"
          class="ma-4"
          height="200"
          width="200"
          @click="toggle"
      >
        <v-row
            class="fill-height"
            align="center"
            justify="center"
        >
          <v-scale-transition>
            <v-icon
                v-if="active"
                color="white"
                size="48"
                v-text="'mdi-close-circle-outline'"
            ></v-icon>
          </v-scale-transition>
        </v-row>
      </v-card>
    </v-slide-item>
  </v-slide-group>
</template>

<script>
import TheSlideGroup from "../components/carousels/TheSlideGroup.vue";

export default {
  name: "IndexView",
  components: {TheSlideGroup},
  data: () => ({
    pageName: "",
    height: 0
  }),
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
